Smart Hammock: A hammock with built-in smart features that allow users to control the temperature, lighting, and even the comfort level of the hammock with a smartphone app.
Multi-functional Hammock: A hammock that can be transformed into a couch, a bed, or a chair depending on the user's needs.
Portable Hammock: A compact and lightweight hammock that can be easily transported and set up in any location.
Hammock with Built-in Speakers: A hammock with built-in speakers that allow users to listen to music or podcasts while relaxing.
Hammock with Built-in Charging Station: A hammock with a built-in charging station that allows users to charge their phone or other devices while relaxing.
